Translations.Text: Ilm ʙa ruzi qijomat nazdi Ust. Va har mevae az ƣilofi xud ʙerun meojad va har modae homilador mesavadu mezojad, alʙatta ki U ʙa on ogoh ast. Va on ruz, ki onhoro nido dihad, ki sarikoni Man kucojand? Gujand: Ogohat kardem, ki kase az mo ʙa sirk guvohi namedihad
Va on ciro pes az in ʙa, xudoi mexondand, az dast dodand va donistand, ki rohi gureze nadorand
Odami har ci talaʙi xajr kunad, xasta namesavad, ammo cun ʙadi ʙa u ʙirasad, ʙadandesu noumed megardad

Agar pas az rance, ki ʙa u rasida, rahmate ʙa u ʙicasonem, megujad: «In haqqi man ast va napindoram, ki qijomate ʙarpo savad. Va agar ham maro nazdi Parvardigoram ʙargardonand, alʙatta, ki nazdi U holate xustar ʙosad». Pas kofironro ʙa amalhoe, ki kardaand, ogoh mekunem va ʙa onho azoʙe saxt mecasonem
Cun ʙa odami ne'mate ato kunem, rujgardon mesavad va ʙa takaʙʙur gardan ʙolo mekunad. Va agar ʙa u ʙadie ʙirasad, ʙisjor farjodu fiƣon mekunad
Bigu: «Ci meʙined?» Agar in kitoʙ az coniʙi Xudost va sumo ʙa on imon nameovared, gumrohtar az kase, ki hamcunon rohi muxolifat (ziddijat) dar pes giriftaast, kist
Ba zudi, ojoti qudrati Xudro dar atrofi olam va dar vucudi xudason ʙa onho nison xohem dod, to ʙarojason oskor savad, ki, U haq ast. Ojo in ki Parvardigori tu dar hama co hozir ast, kofi nest
Bahus (ogoh) ʙos, ki onho az didori Parvardigorason dar suʙhaand. Bahus ʙos, ki U ʙar har cize ihota dorad
Ho, mim
Ajn, sin, qof
Xudovandi ƣoliʙu hakim ʙa tu va kasone, ki pes az tu ʙudand, incunin vahj mefiristad
az oni Ust, har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast. Va Ust on ʙalandmartaʙai ʙuzurgvor

Nazdik ast, ki osmonho ʙa ʙoloi jakdigar dar ham sikanand va faristagon ʙa sitoisi Parvardigorason tasʙeh megujand va ʙaroi sokinoni zamin ʙaxsois metalaʙand. Ogoh ʙosed, ki Xudo ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon ast
Xudo muroqiʙi (noziri) a'moli kasonest, ki ƣajri Uro ʙa dusti giriftand. Va tu vakili onho nesti

Va niz in Qur'onro ʙa zaʙoni araʙi ʙar tu vahj kardem to ummulquro va sokinoni atrofasro ʙim dihj. Hamcunin ononro az ruzi qijomat, ki dar on sakke nest, ʙitarsoni, ki guruhe dar ʙihistand va guruhe dar otasi suzon
Agar Xudo mexost, hamaro jak ummat karda ʙud. Vale U har kiro ki ʙixohad, ʙa rahmati xud darovarad va sitamkoronro hec dustu jovare nest
Ojo ƣajri Xudoro ʙa dusti giriftand? Dusti haqiqi Xudost. Va Ust, ki murdagonro zinda mekunad va Ust, ki ʙar har kore tavonost
Dar har ci ixtilof mekuned, hukmas ʙo Xudost. In Xudoi jakto Parvardigori man ast. Bar U tavakkal kardam va ʙa U ruj meovaram

Ofaridgori osmonhovu zamin ast. Baroi sumo, ham az sumo hamsarone ʙijofarid. Va niz ʙaroi corpojon cufthoe padid ovard. Vo ofarinisi hamsaron ʙar sumoraton meafzojad. Hec ciz monandi U nest va Ust, ki sunavovu ʙinost
Kalidhoi osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust. Dar ruzii har ki ʙixohad, kusois medihad jo tang megirad va U ʙa har cize donost

Baroi sumo dinu oine muqarrar kard az hamon guna, ki ʙa Nuh tavsija karda ʙud va az on ci ʙar tu vahj kardaem va ʙa Iʙrohimu Muso va Iso tavsija kardaem, ki dinro ʙarpoj nigah dored va dar on firqa-firqa masaved. Tahammuli on ci ʙa on da'vat mekuned, ʙar musrikon dusvor ast. Xudo har kiro xohad, ʙaroi pajƣamʙarii Xud intixoʙ mekunad va har kiro ʙa u ʙozgardad, ʙa Xud roh menamojad

Az rui hasadu adovat firqa-firqa sudand, az on pas, ki ʙa donis dast joftand. Va agar Parvardigori tu az pes muqarrar nakarda ʙud, ki onhoro to zamone mu'ajjan muhlat ast, ʙar onho hukmi azoʙ meraft. Va kasone, ki ʙa'd az onho vorisi kitoʙi Xudo sudaand, dar ʙorai on saxt ʙa suʙha aftodaand

Baroi on da'vat kun va cunon ki farmon joftai, pojdori kun va az pai xohishojason marav va ʙigu: «Ba kitoʙe, ki Xudo nozil kardaast, imon doram va ʙa man farmon dodaand, ki dar mijoni sumo ʙa adolat raftor kunam. Xudoi jakto Parvardigori mo va Parvardigori sumost. A'moli mo az oni mo va a'moli sumo az oni sumo. Mijonu movu sumo hec muhoccae (dusmanie) nest. Xudo moro dar jak co cam' meovarad va ʙozgast ʙa sui Ust!»
Va kasone, ki dar ʙorai Xudo cidol mekunand, pas az on ki da'vati Uro icoʙat kardaand, nazdi Parvardigorason huccatason nociz ast. Bar onhost xasmi Xudo va ʙar onhost azoʙe saxt
Xudost, ki in kitoʙi ʙarxaq va tarozuro nozil kardaast. Va tu ci medoni? Sojad qijomat nazdik ʙosad

Onon, ki ʙovaras nadorand, (omadani) onro ʙa sitoʙ metalaʙand va onon, ki imon ovardaand, az on ʙimnokand va medonand, ki haq ast. Ogoh ʙos, kasone, ki dar ʙorai qijomat cidol mekunand, saxt dar gumrohi hastand
Xudo ʙo ʙandagonas mehruʙon ast. Har kiro ʙixohad, ruzi medihad. Va U tavonovu ƣoliʙ ast
Har kas kisti oxiratro ʙixohad, ʙa kistaas meafzoem va har kas kisti dunjoro ʙixohad, ʙa u ato mekunem, vale digar dar kisti oxiratas nasiʙe nest

Ojo musrikonro ʙutonest, ki dine ʙarojason ovardaand, ki Xudo ruxsati onro nadodaast? Va agar qasdi ta'xiri (ʙa der partoftani) azoʙason naʙud, korason ʙa pojon omada ʙud va sitamkoronro azoʙest dardovar

Sitamkoronro ʙini, ki az hosili korhojason ʙimnokand. Va alʙatta, ʙa cazoi xud xohand rasid. Vale onho, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, dar ʙoƣhoi ʙihistand. Har ci ʙixohand, nazdi Parvardigorason hast. Va in fazlu ʙaxsoisti ʙuzurgest

In ast on cize, ki Xudo on guruh az ʙandagokasro, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙa on muƶda medihad. Bigu: «Bar on taʙliƣi Qur'on muzde az sumo cuz dust dostani xesovandon namexoham». Va har ki kori neke kunad, ʙa nekuijas meafzoem, zero Xudo ʙaxsojandavu sukrpazir ast
Jo megujand, ki ʙar Xudo duruƣ meʙandad. Agar Xudo ʙixohad, ʙar dili tu muhr menihad. Va Xudo ʙa kaligmoti xud ʙotilro mahv mekunad va haqro soʙit megardonad. U ʙar har ci dar dilho meguzarad, donost
Va Ust, ki tavʙai ʙandagonasro mepazirad va az gunohon afvason mekunad va har ci mekuned, medonad
Va duʹoi kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, icoʙat mekunad va az fazli xud ononro ʙisjor medihad. Va kofironro azoʙe saxt ast
Agar Xudo ruzii ʙandagonasro ʙisjor kunad, dar zamin fasod mekunand, vale ʙa miqdore, ki ʙixohad, ruzi mefiristad. Zero ʙar ʙandagoni xud ogohu ʙinost
Va Ust on Xudoe, ki ʙa'd az noumedijason ʙoron mefiristad va rahmati Xudro ʙa hama co parokanda mekunad va Ust korsozu sohiʙi hamdu sano
Va az nisonahoi qudrati U ofarinisi osmonhovu zamin va parokandani cunʙandagon dar on dust. Va har goh ʙixohad, ʙar cam' ovardanason tavonost
Agar sumoro musiʙate rasad, ʙa xotiri korhoest, ki kardaed. Va Xudo ʙisjore az gunohonro afv mekunad
Sumo natavoned dar rui zamin az U ʙigurezed va sumoro ƣajri U korsozu jovare nest
Az nisonahoi qudrati U kistihoest cun kuh ki dar darjoho ravonand
Agar ʙixohad, ʙodro nigah medorad, to kistiho ʙar rui darjo az raftan ʙozmonand. Alʙatta dar in ʙaroi saʙrkunandagoni sukrguzor iʙrathoest
Jo onhoro ʙa xotiri amalhojason ƣark mekunad va ʙisjorero niz meʙaxsojad
Va to ʙidonand, kasone, ki dar ojoti Mo cidol mekunand. Ononro hec gurezgohe nest
On ci sumoro dodaand, ʙahrai in zindagii dunjavist. Va on ci dar nazdi Xudost, ʙaroi onho, ki imon ovardaand va ʙa Parvardigorason tavakkal mekunand, ʙehtaru pojandatar ast
Va on kasone, ki az gunohoni ʙuzurg va zistiho parhez mekunand va cun dar xasm savand, xatohoro meʙaxsojand
va onon, ki da'vati Parvardigorasonro qaʙul mekunand va namoz meguzorand va korason ʙar pojai masvarat ʙo jakdigar ast va az on ci ʙa onho ruzi dodaem, sadaqa mekunand
va onon, ki cun sitame ʙa onho rasad, intiqom megirand
Cazoi har ʙadi ʙadiest monandi on. Pas kase, ki afv kunad va osti kunad, muzdas ʙo Xudost, zero U sitamkoronro dust nadorad
Bar kasone, ki pas az zulme, ki ʙar onho rafta ʙosad, intiqom megirand, malomate nest
Malomat ʙar kasonest, ki ʙa mardum zulm mekunand va ʙa nohaq dar rui zamin sarkasi mekunand. Baroi onhost azoʙe dardovar
Va on ki saʙr kunad va az xato darguzarad, in az korhoi pisandida ast
Har kasro, ki Xudo gumroh kunad, az on pas hec duste naxohad dost. Va zolimonro meʙini, ki cun azoʙro ʙingarand, megujand: «Ojo moro rohi ʙozgaste hast?»

Onhoro meʙini, ki ʙa cahannam meʙarand. Tarsonu xor az gusai casm nigohe duzdida mekunand. Kasone, ki imon ovarda ʙudand, megujand: «Inho xud va kasonasonro dar ruzi qijomat ʙarʙod dodand». Ogoh ʙos, ki sitamkoron dar azoʙi doim xohand ʙud
Ƣajri Xudo joru madadgore nadorand va har kasro, ki Xudo gumroh kunad, hec rohe ʙarojas nest
Pes az on ki ruze ʙijojad, ki az coniʙi Xudo ʙozgaste nadorad, ʙa Parvardigoraton cavoʙi qaʙul dihed. Dar on ruz na panohe xohed dost va na kase az sumo muhofizat tavonad kard

Agar ruj gardonand, turo nafiristodaem, ki nigahʙonason ʙosi. Bar tu ƣajri rasonidani pajƣom hec nest. Va Mo cun ʙa inson az rahmati Xud ʙicasonem, sodmon megardad va agar ʙa xotiri korhoe, ki kardaast, noravoi ʙa u rasad, nosiposi mekunad
Az oni Xudost farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin. Har ci ʙixohad, meofarinad. Ba har ki ʙixohad, duxtar meʙaxsad va ʙa har ki ʙixohad, pisar meʙaxsad
Va jo ham pisar dihad va ham duxtar. Va har kasro ʙixohad, aqim (nozo) megardonad, zero U donovu tavonost
Hec ʙasarero narasad, ki Xudo cuz ʙa vahj jo az on sui parda ʙo u suxan gujad. Jo faristae mefiristad to ʙa farmoni U har ci ʙixohad, ʙa u vahj kunad. U ʙalandpojavu hakim ast

Hamcunin kalomi Xudro ʙa farmoni Xud ʙa tu vahj kardem. Tu namedonisti kitoʙu imon cist. Vale Mo onro nure soxtem to har jak az ʙandagonamonro, ki ʙixohem, ʙa on hidojat kunem va tu ʙa rohi rost roh nison medihi
rohi on Xudoe, ki az oni Ust har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast. Ogoh ʙosed, ki hamai korho ʙa Xudo ʙozmegardad
Ho, mim
Savgand ʙa in kitoʙi ravsangar
Mo in kitoʙro Qur'one araʙi qaror dodem, ʙosad, ki ʙa aql darjoʙed
Va on dar ummulkitoʙ ast dar nazdi Mo: kitoʙe arcmandu hikmatomez
Ojo ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki mardume az had guzasta hasted, az sumo ruj gardonem va Qur'onro az sumo dareƣ dorem
Ba mijoni pesinijon pajomʙaroni ʙisjore firistodem
Va hec pajomʙare ʙar onho firistoda namesud, ki masxaraas nakarda ʙosand
Onhoro, ki az onho ʙoquvvattar ʙudand, halok kardem. Va dostoni pesinijon guzast
Agar az onho ʙipursi: «Ci kase osmonhovu zaminro ofaridaast?» Megujand: «Onhoro on ƣoliʙi dono ofaridaast!»
On ki zaminro ʙisoti sumo soxt va ʙarojaton rohho dar on padid ovard, ʙosad, ki hidojat saved
Va on ki az osmon oʙ firistod ʙa miqdor. Va ʙa on sarzamini murdaro zinda kardem. Sumo niz incunin az gurho ʙerun ovarda saved
va on ki hamai cufthoro ʙijofarid. Va ʙarojaton az kistiho va corpojon markaʙho soxt, ki savor saved
Va cun ʙar pusti onho qaror girifted, ne'mati Parvardigoratonro jod kuned va ʙigued: «Pok ast on kas, ki inhoro romi mo kard, vagarna moro tavoni on naʙud
Va mo ʙa sui Parvardigoramon ʙozmegardem»
Va ʙaron U az mijoni ʙandagonas farzande qoil sudand. Odami ʙa oskoro nosipos (nosukr) ast
Ojo U az mijoni maxluqonas ʙaroi Xud duxtaron ʙargirifta va pisaronro xosi sumo kardaast
Va cun ʙa jake az onho muƶdai tavalludi hamon cizero dihand, ki ʙa Xudoi rahmon nisʙat doda, rujas sijoh gardad va pur az xasm savad
Ojo on ki ʙa orois parvaris jofta (ja'ne duxtar) va dar hangomi cidol oskor namegardad, az oni Xudost
Va faristagonro, ki ʙandagoni Xudojand, zan pindostand. Ojo ʙa hangomi ofarinisason on co hozir ʙudaand? Ba zudi in sohidiasonro menavisand va az onho ʙozxost mesavad
Guftand: «Agar Xudoi rahmon mexost, mo faristagonro nameparastidem». On ci megujand, az rui nodonist va ƣajri ʙa duruƣ suxan namegujand
Ojo pes az Qur'on kitoʙe ʙarojason nozil kardaem, ki aknun ʙa on cang mezanand? (pajravi mekunand)
Na, megujand: «Padaronamonro ʙar dine joftem va mo az pai onho meravem»
Va on tavr pes az tu ʙa kadom dehae ʙimdihandae firistodem, mutana'imonas (sohiʙne'matonas) guftand: «Padaronamonro ʙar dine joftem va mo ʙa amalhoi onho iqtido (panravi) mekunem»
Guft: «Hatto agar ʙaroi sumo cize ʙijovaram, ki az on ci padaronatonro ʙar on jofta ʙuded, hidojatkunandatar ʙosad?» Guftand: «Mo ʙa dine, ki sumoro ʙa on firistodaand, ʙeimonem»
Pas az onho intiqom giriftem. Va ʙingar, ki oqiʙati duruƣʙarorandagon ci guna ʙudaast
Va Iʙrohim ʙa padaru qavmas guft: «Man az on ci sumo meparasted, ʙezoram
ƣajri on ki maro ofarida, ki U rohnamoijam xohad kard»
Va in suxanro dar farzandoni xud suxane pojanda kard, ʙosad, ki ʙa Xudo ʙozgardand
Va Man inhovu padaronasonro az zindagi ʙahramand kardam, to on goh ki haq va pajomʙare ravsangar ʙa sujason omad
Cun haq ʙar onho oskor sud, guftand: «In codust va mo ʙa on imon nameovarem»
Guftand: «Caro in Qur'on ʙar marde az ʙuzurgmardoni on du deha nozil nasudaast?»

Ojo onon rahmati Parvardigoratro taqsim mekunand? Xol on ki mo ruzii onhoro dar in zindagii dunjo mijonason taqsim mekunem. Va ʙa'zero ʙa martaʙa ʙolotar az ʙa'ze digar qaror dodaem, to ʙa'ze ʙa'zi digarro ʙa xidmat girand. Va rahmati Parvardigorat az on ci onho cam' meovarand, ʙehtar ast
Va agar na on ʙud, ki hamai mardum jak ummat namesudand, saqfhoi xonahoi kasonero, ki Xudoi rahmonro ʙovar nadorand, az nuqra mekardem va ʙar onho nardʙonhoe, menihodem, to ʙar on ʙolo ravand
Va ʙaroi xonahojason niz darhoe az nuqra mekardem va taxthoe, ki ʙar onho takja zanand
va az har guna zinat. Va hamai inho ʙahramandii nocizi dunjavist, hol on ki oxirat dar nazdi Parvardigori tu ʙaroi parhezgoron ast
Har kas, ki az jodi Xudoi rahmon ruj gardonad, sajtone ʙar u oʙasta mekunem,, ki hameosa hamrohas ʙosad
Va on sajtonho ononro az rohi Xudo ʙozmegardonand, vale pindorand, ki hidojatjoftagonand
To on goh ki nazdi Mo ojad, megujad: «Ej kos, durii manu tu (misli) durii masriqu maƣriʙ ʙud. Va tu ci hamrohi ʙade ʙudi»
Cun sitam karded, on ruz pusajmoni foida nakunad va har du dar azoʙ sarik ʙosed
Ojo tu mexohi ʙa karon suxan ʙisunavoni jo kuron va onhoero, ki dar gumrohii oskor hastand, roh nison dihi
Va agar turo ʙiʙarem, az onho intiqom megirem
Jo on azoʙero, ki ʙa onho va'da dodaem, ʙa tu nison medihem, ki Mo ʙar onho tavono hastem
Pas dar on ci ʙa tu vahj sudaast, cang ʙizan, (pajravi kun), ki tu ʙar rohi rost hasti
Va Qur'on saʙaʙi ʙalandovoza gastani tu va qavmi tust va ʙa zudi ʙozxost saved
Az pajomʙaroni Mo, ki pes az tu firistodaem, ʙipurs: «Ojo ƣajri Xudoi rahmon digarero ʙaroi parastisi onho qaror doda ʙudem?»
Va alʙatta Musoro hamroh ʙo ojoti Xud ʙar Fir'avn va raisoni qavmas firistodem va guft: «Man firistodai Parvardigori cahonijonam!»
Cun ojoti Moro ʙar onon arza dost, ʙa nogoh hama az on ʙa xanda aftodand
Va har mu'cizae, ki ʙa onho nison dodem, az mu'cizai digar azimtar ʙud. On goh hamaro ʙa azoʙ giriftor kardem, ʙosad, ki ʙozgardand
Guftand: «Ej codugar, Parvardigoratro ʙo on nomhoe, ki ʙo tu vahj kardaast, ʙarom mo ʙixon, ki mo hidojatsudagonem»
Cun azoʙro az onho ʙardostem, pajmoni xudro sikastand
Fir'avn dar mijoni mardumas nido dod, ki ej qavmi man, ojo podsohii Misru in cujʙoron, ki az zeri poi man cori hastand, az oni man nestand? Ojo nameʙined
Ojo man ʙehtaram jo in mardi xori zalil, ki durust suxan guftan natavonad
Caro dasthojasro ʙa dastʙandhoi tillo najorostaand? Va caro guruhe az faristagon hamrohas najomadaand
Pas Fir'avn qavmi xudro gumroh soxt, to ʙa u ito'at kardand, ki mardume taʙah kor ʙudand
Cun Moro ʙa xasm ovardand, az onho intiqom giriftem va hamagonro ƣarq soxtem
Ononro dar sumori guzastagon va doston ʙaroi ojandagon kardem
Va cun dostoni pisari Marjam ovarda sud, qavmi tu ʙa sodmoni farjod zadand
va guftan, d: «Ojo xudojoni mo ʙehtarand jo U?» Va in suxanro faqat ʙaroi cidol ʙo tu guftaand, ki mardume xusumat kunandaand
U faqat ʙandae ʙud, ki Mo ne'matas ato kardem va mojai iʙrati ʙani- Isroilas gardonidem
Agar mexostem, ʙa coi sumo faristagone padid meovardem, to dar rui zamin conisini sumo gardand
Va ʙesuʙha u (Iso) nisonai faro rasidani qijomat ast. Dar in sak makuned va ʙa Man pajravi kuned! In ast rohi rost
Sajton sumoro az roh ʙoznagardonad, zero u dusmani oskori sumost
Va cun Iso ʙo dalelhoi ravsani xud omad, guft: «Barojaton hikmat ovardaam va omadaam, to cizhoero, ki dar on ixtilof mekuned, ʙajon kunam. Pas az Xudo ʙitarsed va ʙa man ito'at kuned
Xudoi jakto Parvardigori manu Parvardigori sumost. Uro ʙiparasted. Rohi rost in ast»
Guruhho ʙo ham ixtilof kardand. Pas voj ʙar sitamkoron az azoʙi dardovari qijomat
Ojo casm ʙa rohi cize cuz qijomatand, ki nogoh va ʙexaʙar ʙar onho ʙijojad
Dar on ruz duston, — ƣajr az parhezgoron, — dusmani jakdigarand
Ej ʙandagoni Man, dar on ruz ʙime ʙar sumo nest va sumo ƣamgin namesaved
On kason, ki ʙa ojoti Mo imon ovardaand va taslimi amri Mo sudaand
sumo va cufthojaton ʙo sodkomi ʙa ʙihist doxil saved
Qadahhoi zarrin va kuzahoro dar mijonason ʙa gardis meovarand. Dar on cost har ci nafs orzu kunad va dida az on lazzat ʙiʙarad. Va dar on co covidona xohed ʙud
In ʙihistest, ki ʙa ivazi korhoe, ki kardaed, ʙa merosas meʙared
Dar on co ʙarojaton mevahoi ʙisjor hast, ki az onho mexured
Gunahkoron dar azoʙi cahannam covidonand
Azoʙason kam namesavad va onho az noumedi xomus ʙosand
Mo ʙa onho zulme nakardaem, onho xud ʙa xudason sitam kardaand
Farjod ʙarovarand, ki ej moliki duzax kos Parvardigori tu moro ʙimironad. Megujad: «Na, sumo dar in co mondani hasted»
Mo sumoro ʙo haq osno kardem, vale ʙestaraton haqro ʙad dided
Ojo onho dar e'tiqodi xud poj fisurdaand? Mo ham poj fisurdaem
Ojo mepindorand, Mo rozu nacvo (suxanoni pinhoniasonro) namesunavem? Ore, rasuloni Mo nazdi onho hastand va menavisand
Bigu: «Agar Xudoi rahmonro farzande meʙud, man az naxustin parastandagon meʙudam
Pok ast Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va Parvardigori ars az on nisʙatho, ki ʙa U medihend
Pas ʙiguzorason, to ʙa hamon suxanoni ʙotil masƣul ʙosand va ʙa ʙozica sargarm, to on ruze, ki onhoro va'da dodaand, ʙirasad
Ust, ki ham dar osmon Xudost va ham dar zamin Xudost va hakimu donost
Bartaru ʙuzurgvortar ast on kas, ki farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin va har ci dar mijoni onhost, az oni Ust va ilmi faro rasidani qijomat xosi Ust va ʙa U ʙozgardonida mesaved
Kasone ƣajri Uro, ki ʙa xudoi mexonand, qodir ʙa safo'ati kase nestand. Ƣajri kasone, ki az rui ilm ʙa haq sohidi doda ʙosand
Agar az onho ʙipursi, ki ci kase onhoro ofaridaast, megujand: «Olloh». Pas caro az haq ruj megardonand
Guftori pajjomʙar in ʙud: «Ej Parvardigori man, inho mardume hastand, ki imon nameovarand
Pas, az onho darguzar va ʙigu: «Salomat ʙosed!» Ore, ʙa zudi xohand donist
Ho, mim
Savgand ʙa in kitoʙi ravsangar
Mo onro dar saʙi muʙorake nozil kardem. Mo ʙimdihanda ʙudaem
Dar on saʙ har farmone muvofiqi hikmat sodir mesavad
farmone az coniʙi Mo. Va firistandai on ʙudaem
Rahmatest az coniʙi Parvardigorat va alʙatta Ust sunavovu dono
Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni in du ast, agar sumo jaqinkunandaed
Nest Xudoe ƣajri U. Znnda mekunadu memironad. Parvardigori sumovu Parvardigori padaroni pesini sumost
Na, onho hamcunon ʙa sakki xud dilxusand
Pas muntaziri ruze ʙos, ki osmon ʙa oskoro dud ʙijovarad
Va on dud hamai mardumro dar xud furu girad. Va in azoʙest dardovar
«Ej Parvardigori mo, in azoʙro az mo dur gardon, ki mo imon ovardaem»
Kuco pand megirand? Hol on ki cun pajomʙari ravsangar ʙar onho firistoda sud
az u rujgardon sudand va guftand: «Devonaest ta'limjofta!»
Azoʙro andake ʙarmedorem va sumo ʙoz ʙa dini xud ʙozmegarded
Ruze onhoro ʙa savlate (hamlae) saxt furu girem, ki Mo intiqomgirandaem
Pes az onho qavmi Fir'avnro ozmudem va pajomʙare ʙuzurgvor nazdason omad
«ki ʙandagoni Xudoro ʙa man taslim kuned, ki man pajomʙare aminam
Va niz ʙar Xudo sarkasi makuned, ki man ʙo huccate ravsan nazdi sumo omadaam
Va agar ʙixohed ʙar man sang ʙizaned, man ʙa Parvardigori xud va Parvardigori sumo panoh meʙaram
va agar ʙa man imon nameovarad, az man kanor gired»
Pas Parvardigorasro duo kard, ki inho mardume mucrimand (gunahgorand)
Bandagoni Maro saʙhangom ravona kun, to az pai sumo ʙijojand
Darjoro orom pusti sar guzor, ki on laskar ƣarqsudagonand
Ba'd az xud ci ʙoƣhovu casmasorho ʙar coj guzostand
va kistzorhovu xonahoi neku
va ne'mate, ki dar on ƣarqi sodmoni ʙudand
Hamcunin sud va Mo on ne'mathoro ʙa mardume digar meros guzostem
Na osmon ʙar onho girist va na zamin va na ʙa onho muhlat doda sud
Va mo ʙani-Isroilro az on azoʙi xorkunanda xalos kardem
az azoʙi Fir'avni sarkasi az had guzaranda
va az rui ilm ʙar ahli cahonason ʙarguzidem
Va ojote ʙa onho ato kardem, ki dar on imtihone oskor ʙud
Alʙatta inho megujand
«Pojoni kor cuz hamin margi naxustin nest va mo digar ʙor zinda namesavem
Va agar rost megued, padaroni moro ʙa cahon ʙozovared»
Ojo inho ʙehtarand jo qavmi Tuʙʙa' va kasone, ki pes az on qavm ʙudand? Hamaro halok kardem, ki mucrimon (gunahgoron) ʙudand
Mo in osmonhovu zamin va on ciro mijoni onhost, ʙa ʙozica najofaridaem
Onhoro ʙa haq ofaridaem, vale ʙestarin namedonand
Va'dagohi hama dar ruzi dovari qijomat ast
Ruze, ki hec duste az dusti xud cizero daf' nakunad va az sui kase jori nasavad
ƣajri kase, ki Xudo ʙar u ʙuʙaxsojad, zero Ust ƣoliʙu mehruʙon
Har oina (Alʙatta) daraxti zukkum
ta'omi gunohkoron ast

Monandi cusidani oʙi cuson
Bigiredas va ʙa saxti ʙa mijoni cahannamas ʙikased
va ʙar saras oʙi cuson ʙirezed, to sikanca savad

In hamon cizest, ki dar on sak mekarded
Parhezkoron dar coi amne hastand
dar ʙoƣhovu casmasorho
liʙoshoe az sundusu istaʙraq mepusand va ruʙarui ham mesinand
Hamcunin hurul'ajnro (huroni faroxcasm) ʙa hamsarijason darovarem
Dar osoistagi har mevaero, ki ʙixohand, metalaʙand
Dar on co ta'mi margro namecasand, ƣajri hamon margi avvalin. Va onhoro Xudo az azoʙi cahannam nigoh dostaast
In ʙaxsisest az coniʙi Parvardigorat va in piruzii ʙuzurgest
Mo adoi suxani xud ʙar zaʙoni tu oson kardem, ʙosad, ki pand girand
Tu muntazir ʙos, ki onho niz muntazirand
Ho, mim
Nozil sudani in kitoʙ az coniʙi Xudoi ƣoliʙu hakim ast
Alʙatta dar osmonhovu zamin nisonahoi iʙratest ʙaroi mu'minon
Va dar ofarinisi sumo va parokanda sudani cunʙandagon iʙrathost ʙaroi ahli jaqin. (imon)
Omadusudi saʙu ruz va rizqe, ki Xudo az osmon mefiristad va zamini murdaro ʙa on zinda mekunad va niz dar vazisi ʙodho iʙrathost ʙaroi oqilon
Inho ojoti Xudost, ki ʙa rosti ʙar tu tilovat mekunem. Ƣajri Xudovu ojotas ʙa kadom suxan imon meovarand
Voj ʙar har duruƣʙofi gunahkore
Ojoti Xudoro, ki ʙar u xonda mesavad, mesunavad. On goh ʙa gardankasi saxt meistad, cunon ki gui hec nasunidaast. Pas ʙa azoʙe dardovaras ʙasorat (xusxaʙar) deh
Cun cize az ojoti Moro faro girad, ʙa masxaraas megirad, inho sazovori azoʙe xorkunandaand
Pesi rujason cahannam ast. Va mole, ki ʙa dast ovardaand va kasone, ki ƣajri Xudoi jakto ʙa xudoi giriftaand, ʙa holason foida nakunad. Onhorost azoʙe ʙuzurg
In rahnamoiest. Va onon, ki ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason imon nameovarand, ʙarojason azoʙest va saxttarin azoʙhoi dardovar
Xudost, ki darjoro romi sumo kard, to dar on ʙa farmoni U kistiho ravon ʙosand va talaʙi ma'isat kuned, ʙosad, ki sukrguzor ʙosed
Romi sumo soxt on ci dar osmonhost va on ci dar zamin ast. Hama az oni Ust. Dar in ʙaroi fikrkunandagon iʙrathoest
Ba kasone, ki imon ovardaand, ʙigu: «Az xatoi kasone, ki ʙa ruzhoi Xudo ʙovar nadorand, darguzared, to xud on mardumro ʙa cazoi amalhoe, ki murtakiʙ sudaand (kardaand), cazo dihad
Har kas kori soistae kunad, ʙa naf'i xudi ust va har kas murtakiʙi kori ʙade savad, ʙa zijoni ust. Sipas hama ʙa sui Parvardigoraton ʙozgardonda mesaved
Mo ʙa ʙani-Isroil kitoʙ va ilmi dovarivu pajomʙari ato kardem va az cizhoi pokizavu xus ruzijason kardem. Va ʙar cahonijon ʙartarijason (ʙehtariason) dodem

Va onhoro dar ʙorai on amr daloile ravsan dodem. Va dar on az rui hasadu kina ixtilof kardand, on goh, ki donis joftand. Xudo dar ruzi qijomat dar on ci ixtilof (ziddijat) mekardand, dovari xohad kard
Pas turo ʙa rohi din andoxtem. Bo on roh ʙirav va az pai xohisi nodonon marav
Inho turo hec az azoʙi Xudo daf' namekunand va zolimon dustdoroni jakdigarand va Xudo dustdori parhezgoron ast
In Qur'on dalelhoi ravsani mardum va hidojatu rahmatest ʙaroi ahli jaqin
Ojo okon, ki kunandai ʙadiho mesavand, mepindorand, ki dar sumori kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, qarorason medihem? Va ojo zindagivu margason jakson ast? Ci ʙad dovari mekunand
Va Xudo osmonhovu zaminro ʙa haq ʙijofarid, to har kasero ʙaroʙari kore, ki kardaast, cazo dihad va ʙa onho sitam nasavad

Ojo on kasro, ki havasasro cun xudoi xud girift va Xudo az rui ilm gumrohas kard va ʙar gusu dilas muhr nihod va ʙar didagonas parda afkand, didai? Agar Xudo hidojat nakunad, ci kase uro hidojat xohad kard? Caro pand namegired
Va guftand: «Cuz zindagii dunjavii mo hec nest. Memiremu zinda mesavem va moro ƣajri dahr halok nakunad». Ononro ʙa on donise nest va faqat dar pindore hastand
Va cun ojoti ravsani Mo ʙar onho tilovat savad, huccatason in ast, ki megujand: «Agar rost megued, padaroni moro zinda kuned»
Bigu: «Xudost, ki sumoro zinda mekunad, pas memiranad va sipas hamaro dar ruzi qijomat, — ki sake dar on nest, — cam' meovarad. Vale ʙestari mardum namedonand!»
Az oni Xudovand ast farmonravoii osmonu zamin. Va on ruz, ki qijomat ʙarpo savad, ahli ʙotil zijon xohand kard
Har ummatero ʙuʙini, ki ʙa zonu daromadaast va har ummatero ʙaroi giriftani nomai a'molas ʙixonand. Dar cunin ruze dar ʙaroʙari amalhoe, ki kardaed, cazo meʙined
In navistai Most, ki ʙa haq suxan megujad, zero Mo korhoero, ki mekardaed, menavistaem
Ammo kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista mekunand. Parvardigorason doxil dar rahmati Xud mekunad va in zafari oskor ast
Ammo, ej onon, ki imon najovardaed, magar ojoti Mo ʙar sumo xonda namesud va sumo takaʙʙur menamuded va mardume gunohkor ʙuded
Cun gufta mesud, ki va'dai Xudo haq ast va dar qijomat sakke nest, megufted: «Mo namedonem qijomat cist? Faqat andak gumone meʙarem va ʙa jaqin (imoni qavi) narasidaem»
Amalhoi zistason dar ʙaroʙarason oskor sud va on cize, ki masxaraas mekardand gird ʙar girdasonro ʙigirift
Ba onho gufta savad: «Imruz faromusaton mekunem, hamcunon, ki sumo didori cunin ruzatonro faromus karda ʙuded. Cojgohaton dar otas ast va sumoro hec jovare nest
Va, in ʙa cazoi on ast, ki ojoti Xudoro ʙa masxara megirifted va zindagii dunjavi sumoro ʙifireft». Pas imruz az in otas kase ʙerunason naʙarad va kase uzrasonro qaʙul nakunad
Sitois az oni Xudost — Parvardigori osmonhovu Parvardigori zamin va Parvardigori cahonijon
Buzurgvori dar osmonhovu zamin xosi Ust va Ust ƣoliʙu hakim
